experience.description: â€¢ Part of the Mars Colonisation Program with Ace Hacker ,in Microsoft Engage 2020â€¢ Worked in a team of three members to build a web application deploying invincible Tic-Tac-Toe game using the Minimax algorithm up till 6th depth, optimised by Alpha-Beta pruningâ€¢ Extended the order of matrices to 4x4 and 5x5 in addition to the 3x3 matrix with 4 difficulty levels, achieving scalability and generalizabiltyâ€¢ Added the feature of providing AI-powered suggestions for the next move to the two human players competing against each otherâ€¢ Designed an interactive and attractive frontend using Javascript, HTML and CSS and hosted the web application on Github pages

projects: [{"title":"Fast Polygon Triangulation","start_date":"Oct 2020","end_date":"Nov 2020","description":"â€¢ Worked under Professor Bodhayan Roy of the Mathematics Department of IIT Kharagpur for a course project of Object Oriented Systems Designâ€¢ Applied Ear-clipping method of quadratic time complexity by iteratively removing ear vertices using a circular doubly linked listâ€¢ Optimised to linearithmic time with 6 times speedup by Seidel's algorithm storing topological information in doubly connected edge listâ€¢ Implemented sweep line algorithm to divide a simple polygon into y-monotone polygons followed by greedy triangulation in linear timeâ€¢ Implemented in C++ using STL and graphics library to implement data structures and visualize triangulation of a simple n-sided polygon"}]
